definition: to believe firmly without any doubt (idiom)/absolute certainty about sth
deep/depth/deeply/(of a color) dark/deep/rich
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
(negative prefix)/not/no
to doubt/to suspect

sentences.english: He knew that without this he cannot win, about that I have no doubt in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 他明白不靠這些他無法獲勝，對此我深信不疑。

sentences.english: You are a paedophile; I'm deeply convinced.
sentences.chinese: 你是一個戀童癖者，我對此深信不疑。

sentences.english: I began to get cold feet, but the other two guys were totally positive .
sentences.chinese: 我開始動搖，可其他兩個人卻深信不疑。

sentences.english: Faith is the bird that fells the light when the dawn still dark.
sentences.chinese: 信仰如小鳥在黑暗的黎明仍然深信不疑。

sentences.english: And Cheryl have also convinced Joe is a hero in her mind forever.
sentences.chinese: 而謝麗爾對此也深信不疑，喬是她心目中永遠的英雄。

sentences.english: Ancient Egypt is one the civilization which and will die after next life reactivates believes in firmly.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及是一個對來世和死後復活深信不疑的文明。
在許願時，必須要深信不疑。

sentences.english: Hu Jixiang is the first time in a relationship and women, the floret.
sentences.chinese: 胡濟祥是第一次和女人發生關係，對小花深信不疑。

sentences.english: So here is what I believe.
sentences.chinese: 以下就是我所深信不疑的。

definition: half doubting/dubious/skeptical
to take sth to be true
half believing, half doubting/skeptical
to believe firmly
to believe firmly/devout in one's faith
to snort disdainfully/to scoff at/to turn up one's nose
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to have faith in/to believe in/to have confidence in/to respect
to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere/to worship/to deify/to make a holy cow of sth/to put sb on a pedestal
to listen to information/to get the news/to believe what one hears
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
absolutely true (idiom)/manifold/true from many points of view
lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
